meta.author: Max Tremaine
meta.welcome_message:
Hi Stranger!

Welcome to the console of my website. Take a look at my XMLHttpRequest and data structure. Pretty sweet right? You can find all of the code that I used to put this together in the source, and all of the data at http://www.maxtremaine.com/max_tremaine_dot_com.json.

-Max

favourite_books.title: The Hard Thing About Hard Things
favourite_books.author: Ben Horowitz

favourite_quotes.quote: The worth of a man is his price.
favourite_quotes.author: Thomas Hobbes

favourite_quotes.quote: Don't take refuge in the false security of consensus.
favourite_quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

favourite_quotes.quote: Itâ€™s tough to make predictions, especially about the future.
favourite_quotes.author: Yogi Berra

favourite_quotes.quote: Data is the sword of the 21st century, those who wield it well, the Samurai.
favourite_quotes.author: Jonathan Rosenberg

favourite_quotes.quote: A civilization is built on what is required of men, not on that which is provided to them.
favourite_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

favourite_quotes.quote: Concentrated power is not rendered harmless by the good intentions of those who create it.
favourite_quotes.author: Milton Friedman

favourite_quotes.quote: In mathematics the art of proposing a question must be held of higher value than solving it.
favourite_quotes.author: Georg Cantor

favourite_quotes.quote: The first lesson of economics is scarcity: there is never enough of anything to fully satisfy all those who want it. The first lesson of politics is to disregard the first lesson of economics.
favourite_quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

favourite_quotes.quote: [If] you think of the world as consisting of lottery tickets, you have set yourself up to lose. ... Even though there may be things that involve irreducible elements of luck, it's not an intellectual truth about the world.
favourite_quotes.author: Peter Thiel

articles.title: The Worst Part of Travel
articles.description: Some horror stories about visa applications from Sherpa's customer discovery interviews.

articles.title: Nobody Likes Travel Visas
articles.description: An overview of some of my findings researching travel visa requirements, and people's experiences applying for travel visas.

articles.title: Your Phone Will Replace Your Passport
articles.description: Some of my thoughts on the changing travel documentation landscape.

articles.title: Laws on Your Phone
articles.description: Some of my thoughts on the application of mobile technologies to the consumption of legal and regulatory data.

resume.title: Co-Founder & CEO
resume.description: Business leader of a small team with an innovative product. Established relationships with leaders in the Travel Visa Services market. Developed lean marketing and sales processes.

resume.title: Market Validation & Lean Startup Consultant
resume.description: Facilitated the Market Validation Lab program. Designed course materials to establish Lean Startup methodologies for OCE-backed startups. Advised startup leadership teams in achieving market-ready products.

resume.title: Marketing Analyst
resume.description: Established the marketing pipeline and marketing analysis framework. Formalized policies relating to information security and business continuity. Reported directly to the leadership team.

resume.title: Inbound Certification
resume.description: Gained a basic understanding of best practices and tools in Inbound Marketing.

resume.title: Market Research Analyst
resume.description: Won 'Commitment to Excellence (2013)' for assissting with analysis and insights for a white paper on Price Divergence. Led and contributed to research on the Canadian Retail/CPG market. Acted as first point of contact for Imperial Oil and Canadian Tire accounts.

resume.title: Canadian Securities Course
resume.description: Certified to sell Mutual Funds in Canada.

resume.title: Digital Analytics Fundamentals
resume.description: Trained to use Google's digital analytics tools.

resume.title: Hons. BA Political Science & Psychology (Min. Economics)
resume.description: Rigorous study in statistics and social research.
